description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'teams' managing a list of team members, including actions to add, remove, and update members.

methods.name: addMember
methods.description: Action to add a new member with a generated ID and default role, accepting member data as payload.

methods.name: removeMember
methods.description: Action to remove a member based on their ID.

methods.name: updateMember
methods.description: Action to update an existing member's information identified by ID.
